snippet: With the House scheduled to vote Wednesday on whether to repeal the health care law, some Republicans worry that constantly rearguing the issue makes them seem out of touch.
lead_paragraph: With the House scheduled to vote Wednesday on whether to repeal the health care law, some Republicans worry that constantly rearguing the issue makes them seem out of touch.

headline.main: Cracks Appear in Republican Unity on Health Law Repeal

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: PATIENT PROTECTION AND AFFORDABLE CARE ACT (2010)
